# receive(completion:)

**Instance Method**

Add a completion to the recording.

## Declaration

```swift
mutating func receive(completion: Subscribers.Completion<Failure>)
```

## Discussion

A `fatalError` will be raised if more than one completion is added.
title: receive(completion:)
